hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: One who does not have Triforce can't go in.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Game Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest
